import React, {useEffect,useState} from "react"; const GestionarServicio = () => { const [servicios, setServices] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:5000/services',{ 'methods':'GET', headers : { 'Content-Type':'application/json' } }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => setServices(response)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) return (
